snippet: The NY1 anchor Pat Kiernan shares his Oscar picks and though he's managed to see a number of this year's bigger nominated films, he said that the further down the ballot he went, the more his choices were based on familiarity with the buzz...
abstract: The NY1 anchor Pat Kiernan shares his Oscar picks and though he's managed to see a number of this year's bigger nominated films, he said that the further down the ballot he went, the more his choices were based on familiarity with the buzz surrounding a movie or sheer guess work.
lead_paragraph: Now that the Oscar ballot is official, the Carpetbagger is asking a few notable names to share their Oscar picks. For other ballots in this series, go here, for the author Jeffrey Eugenides's picks, and here to see the "American Idol" judge Randy Jackson's picks.
